Enter Period (YYYYPP) Text PPDField01 3 6 R Enter a valid period (ex. 200201)
Enter Option (S)ummary or (D)etail DropDown PPDField02 1 1 R Enter a valid option (S), (D) H S,D (SUMMARY),(DETAIL)
Sort by Salesrep (A)lpha or (N)umeric DropDown PPDField03 1 1 R Enter a valid option (A), (N) H A,N A,N
Select Invoices (J)ob,(M)an,(O)rd,(A)ll DropDown PPDField04 1 1 R (J)ob, (M)anual, (O)rder, (A)ll H J,M,O,A J,M,O,A
Break on Division? (Y/N) Radio PPDField05 8 1 R
Yes#No`Y#N
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField06 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
